scripts.dev: pwd && concurrently "pwd && docker-compose up" "pwd && cd frontend && BROWSER=none PORT=5000 yarn start" "pwd && cd backend && ./wait-for-services.sh && yarn watch"
scripts.dev-build: pwd && concurrently "pwd && docker-compose up --build" "pwd && cd frontend && BROWSER=none PORT=5000 yarn start" "pwd && cd backend && ./wait-for-services.sh && yarn watch"
